trans-unit.source: Exposes instance methods for creating, moving, and enumerating through directories and subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 公開建立、移動和全面列舉目錄和子目錄的執行個體 (Instance) 方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, and deleting directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>一般作業，例如複製、 移動、 重新命名、 建立和刪除目錄的類別。

trans-unit.source: If you are going to reuse an object several times, consider using the instance method of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> instead of the corresponding static methods of the <xref:System.IO.Directory> class, because a security check will not always be necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要重複使用的物件數次，請考慮使用的執行個體方法<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>而不是對應靜態方法<xref:System.IO.Directory>類別，因為安全性檢查不一定是必要的。

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a path as an input string, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在接受的路徑做為輸入字串的成員，該路徑必須是格式正確，或例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space, the path is not trimmed in methods of the class.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果路徑是完整的但以空格開頭，路徑不被修剪中類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the path is malformed and an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 因此，路徑的格式不正確，而且會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，路徑的組合不被完整的兩倍。

trans-unit.source: For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows 」 也會引發例外狀況在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您的路徑是語式正確的當您使用接受路徑字串的方法。

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory.
trans-unit.target: 接受路徑的成員，在路徑可以參考到檔案或只是目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑也可以參考相對路徑或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑的伺服器和共用的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, all the following are acceptable paths:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列所有條件都是可接受的路徑：

trans-unit.source: "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。

trans-unit.source: "c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "c:\\\MyDir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。

trans-unit.source: "MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 「 MyDir\\\MySubdir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。

trans-unit.source: "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 「\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare 」 在 C# 中，或 「\\\MyServer\MyShare 「 在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: By default, full read/write access to new directories is granted to all users.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，完整讀取/寫入存取新的目錄是授與所有使用者。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates some of the main members of the `DirectoryInfo` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範一些主要成員`DirectoryInfo`類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to copy a directory and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何複製目錄和其內容。

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the path on which to create the <see langword="DirectoryInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定用來建立 <see langword="DirectoryInfo" /> 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> class on the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的路徑上，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not check if a directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不會檢查目錄是否存在。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is a placeholder for a string that is used to access the disk in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式是字串，用來存取後續作業中的磁碟的預留位置。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can be a file name, including a file on a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) share.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以是檔案名稱，包括通用命名慣例 (UNC) 共用上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses this constructor to create the specified directory and subdirectory, and demonstrates that a directory that contains subdirectories cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用這個建構函式建立指定的目錄和子目錄，並示範，無法刪除此目錄包含子目錄。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 包含無效的字元，例如 "、<、> 或 |。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both are too long.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱或兩者都太長。

trans-unit.source: for reading from files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取檔案和目錄。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a directory.
trans-unit.target: 建立目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a directory.
trans-unit.target: 建立目錄。

trans-unit.target: 如果目錄已經存在，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 物件建立目錄。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to create a directory with access control, so there is no chance the directory can be accessed before security is applied.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法多載來建立使用存取控制的目錄，因此沒有機會可以存取目錄，才能套用安全性。

trans-unit.source: The following example throws an exception if you attempt to delete a directory that is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擲回例外狀況，如果您嘗試刪除不是空的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The directory contains a read-only file.
trans-unit.target: 這個目錄包含唯讀檔案。

trans-unit.source: The directory described by this <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> object does not exist or could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 物件描述的目錄不存在，或找不到該目錄。

trans-unit.source: The directory is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 目錄不是空的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The directory is the application's current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 目錄是應用程式目前的工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is an open handle on the directory, and the operating system is Windows XP or earlier.
trans-unit.target: 目錄上有開啟控制代碼，而且作業系統是 Windows XP 或更舊版本。

trans-unit.source: This open handle can result from enumerating directories.
trans-unit.target: 這個開啟控制代碼可能是列舉目錄所產生的結果。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Enumerate Directories and Files](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-enumerate-directories-and-files.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：列舉目錄和檔案](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-enumerate-directories-and-files.md)。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: for writing directories.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入目錄。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to delete this directory, its subdirectories, and all files; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除這個目錄、其子目錄和所有檔案，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Deletes this instance of a <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" />, specifying whether to delete subdirectories and files.
trans-unit.target: 刪除 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 的這個執行個體，並指定是否刪除子目錄和檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the `DirectoryInfo` has no files or subdirectories, this method deletes the `DirectoryInfo` even if `recursive` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`DirectoryInfo`沒有檔案或子目錄，這個方法會刪除`DirectoryInfo`即使`recursive`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to delete a `DirectoryInfo` that is not empty when `recursive` is `false` throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試刪除`DirectoryInfo`，不是空的時`recursive`是`false`會擲回<xref:System.IO.IOException>。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates deleting a directory.

trans-unit.source: Because the directory is removed, first comment out the `Delete` line to test that the directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 因為目錄已被移除，先註解`Delete`列，以測試該目錄存在。

trans-unit.source: Then uncomment the same line of code to test that the directory was removed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 然後取消註解程式碼來測試已成功移除目錄同一的行。

trans-unit.source: The directory contains a read-only file.
trans-unit.target: 這個目錄包含唯讀檔案。

trans-unit.source: The directory is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 目錄是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The directory contains one or more files or subdirectories and <paramref name="recursive" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個目錄包含一或多個檔案或子目錄，且 <paramref name="recursive" /> 是 <see langword="false" />。

The directory is the application's current working directory.

There is an open handle on the directory or on one of its files, and the operating system is Windows XP or earlier.
trans-unit.target: 目錄上或目錄的其中一個檔案上有開啟的控制代碼，而且作業系統是 Windows XP 或之前的版本。

trans-unit.source: This open handle can result from enumerating directories and files.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory information in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前目錄中目錄資訊的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory information in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前目錄中目錄資訊的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of directories in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 目前目錄中目錄的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>方法不同，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，您可以開始列舉的集合<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>物件之前，會傳回整個集合。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> objects to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>，您必須等待的整個陣列<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>才能存取陣列傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: This method pre-populates the values of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> properties:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會預先填入的下列值<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>屬性：

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> method on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的集合不會快取。每次呼叫<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>集合上的方法將會啟動新的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the subdirectories under the C:\Program Files directory and uses a LINQ query to return the names of all directories that were created before 2009 by checking the value of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉位於 C:\Program Files 目錄下的子目錄，並使用 LINQ 查詢來傳回所有藉由檢查值 2009年之前所建立的目錄名稱<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you only need the names of the subdirectories, use the static <xref:System.IO.Directory> class for better performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只需要的子目錄名稱，使用靜態<xref:System.IO.Directory>類別，以提升效能。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The path encapsulated in the <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> object is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 物件中封裝的路徑無效 (例如它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of directories.
trans-unit.target: 要比對目錄名稱的搜尋字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以包含有效常值路徑與萬用 (* 和 ?) 字元的組合，但是不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory information that matches a specified search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合指定之搜尋模式的目錄資訊的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of directories that matches <paramref name="searchPattern" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合 <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 的目錄的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元規範

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合

trans-unit.source: * (asterisk)
trans-unit.target: * (星號)

trans-unit.source: Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "*t" searches for all names in ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，字串"* t"搜尋以字母"t"結尾中的所有名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>方法不同，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of directories.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include only the current directory or all subdirectories.

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows:

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.

trans-unit.target: 傳回的集合不會快取。每次呼叫<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>集合上的方法將會啟動新的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the files under a specified directory and uses a LINQ query to return the names of all files that were created before 2009 by checking the value of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉指定的目錄下的檔案，並使用 LINQ 查詢來傳回所檢查的值 2009年之前所建立的所有檔案的名稱<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.CreationTimeUtc%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you only need the names of the files, use the static <xref:System.IO.Directory> class for better performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只需要的檔案名稱，使用靜態<xref:System.IO.Directory>類別，以提升效能。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to enumerate files in a directory by using different search options.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用不同的搜尋選項來列舉目錄中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes a directory that has files named log1.txt, log2.txt, test1.txt, test2.txt, test3.txt, and a subdirectory that has a file named SubFile.txt.
trans-unit.target: 此範例假設目錄名為具有名為 log1.txt、 log2.txt、 test1.txt、 test2.txt、 test3.txt 和名為 SubFile.txt 檔案的子目錄的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The path encapsulated in the <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> object is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 物件中封裝的路徑無效 (例如它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of files.
trans-unit.target: 要比對檔案名稱的搜尋字串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以包含有效常值路徑與萬用 (* 和 ?) 字元的組合，但是不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of file information that matches a search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合指定之搜尋模式的檔案資訊的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of files that matches <paramref name="searchPattern" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回符合 <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 的檔案的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元規範

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合

trans-unit.source: * (asterisk)
trans-unit.target: * (星號)

trans-unit.source: Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "*t" searches for all names in ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，字串"* t"搜尋以字母"t"結尾中的所有名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>方法不同，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>，您可以開始列舉的集合<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件之前，會傳回整個集合。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>，您必須等待的整個陣列<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>才能存取陣列傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元規範

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合

trans-unit.source: * (asterisk)
trans-unit.target: * (星號)

trans-unit.source: Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "*t" searches for all names in ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，字串"* t"搜尋以字母"t"結尾中的所有名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> methods differ as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>方法不同，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>，您可以開始列舉的集合<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>物件之前，會傳回整個集合。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> objects to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>，您必須等待的整個陣列<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>才能存取陣列傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: This method pre-populates the values of the following <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> properties:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會預先填入的下列值<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>屬性：

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> method on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的集合不會快取。每次呼叫<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>集合上的方法將會啟動新的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="searchPattern" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="searchOption" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.SearchOption" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchOption" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.IO.SearchOption" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The path encapsulated in the <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> object is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 物件中封裝的路徑無效 (例如它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目錄是否存在。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the directory exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目錄存在，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.Exists%2A> property returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.Exists%2A>屬性會傳回`false`如果發生任何錯誤時嘗試判斷指定的檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file.
trans-unit.target: 可能發生這種情況下，會引發例外狀況，例如傳遞檔名無效的字元或太多的字元，失敗或遺失的磁碟，或如果呼叫端沒有讀取檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a use of the `Exists` property in the context of copying a source directory to a target directory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範使用`Exists`內容將來源目錄複製到目標目錄中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full path of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得目錄的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the full path.
trans-unit.target: 含有完整路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access control list (ACL) entries for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前目錄的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> methods to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目目前的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> object that encapsulates the access control list (ACL) entries for the directory described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 物件，該物件會封裝目前 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 物件所描述的目錄之存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> object that encapsulates the access control rules for the directory.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 物件，封裝目錄的存取控制規則。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method overload and specifying the access control sections <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Access?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Owner?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Group?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Access?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Owner?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Group?displayProperty=nameWithType> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法多載，並指定存取控制區段<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Access?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Owner?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Group?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Access?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Owner?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections.Group?displayProperty=nameWithType>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取目前的檔案之存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "*t" searches for all names in ending with the letter "t".

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>方法不同，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>，您可以開始列舉的集合<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件之前，會傳回整個集合。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>，您必須等待的整個陣列<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>才能存取陣列傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: If there are no files in the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>, this method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何檔案在<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>，這個方法會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> method if a specific sort order is required.
trans-unit.target: 不保證的順序傳回的檔案名稱;使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>方法是否需要特定的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>方法不同，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>，您可以開始列舉的集合<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件之前，會傳回整個集合。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> objects to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>，您必須等待的整個陣列<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>才能存取陣列傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: If there are no files in the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>, this method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何檔案在<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>，這個方法會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in the `searchPattern` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`參數。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard character
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Zero or more characters.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: Exactly zero or one character.
trans-unit.target: 剛好零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> method if a specific sort order is required.
trans-unit.target: 不保證的順序傳回的檔案名稱;使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>方法是否需要特定的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "*.txt" searches for all file names having an extension of "txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字串"*.txt"的搜尋，為所有的檔案具有副檔名為"txt"的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all file names beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*"會搜尋所有檔案名稱開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.source: If there are no files, or no files that match the `searchPattern` string in the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>, this method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何檔案或沒有檔案符合之`searchPattern`中<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>，這個方法會傳回空陣列。

trans-unit.source: When using the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` (for example, "*.txt"), the matching behavior varies depending on the length of the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 當使用中的星號萬用字元`searchPattern`(例如 「 *.txt")，比對行為會根據指定的副檔名的長度而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: A `searchPattern` with a file extension of exactly three characters returns files with an extension of three or more characters, where the first three characters match the file extension specified in the `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: A`searchPattern`檔案剛好三個字元的副檔名會傳回三個或多個字元的副檔名的檔案中的前三個字元相符中指定的副檔名`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: A `searchPattern` with a file extension of one, two, or more than three characters returns only files with extensions of exactly that length that match the file extension specified in the `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: A`searchPattern`與檔案的其中一個、 兩個或三個以上的字元的延伸模組會傳回具有該長度為完全符合指定的檔案副檔名的副檔名的檔案`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: When using the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 當使用問號萬用字元，此方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files in a directory, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns only the first file, while a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，給定目錄、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，搜尋的模式中的兩個檔案 」 檔案？。txt"傳回只有第一個檔案中搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。

trans-unit.source: Because this method checks against file names with both the 8.3 file name format and the long file name format, a search pattern similar to "*1\*.txt" may return unexpected file names.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查檔案名稱與 8.3 檔案名稱格式及長檔名格式，因為的搜尋模式類似於"* 1\*.txt 」 可能會傳回未預期的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, using a search pattern of "\*1\*.txt" will return "longfilename.txt" because the equivalent 8.3 file name format would be "longf~1.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用搜尋模式的 「\*1\*.txt"會傳回"longfilename.txt"，因為對等的 8.3 檔案名稱格式會是"longf~1.txt"。

trans-unit.target: 當使用中的星號萬用字元`searchPattern`(例如 「 *.txt")，比對行為會根據指定的副檔名的長度而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: A `searchPattern` with a file extension of exactly three characters returns files with an extension of three or more characters, where the first three characters match the file extension specified in the `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: A`searchPattern`檔案剛好三個字元的副檔名會傳回三個或多個字元的副檔名的檔案中的前三個字元相符中指定的副檔名`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: A `searchPattern` with a file extension of one, two, or more than three characters returns only files with extensions of exactly that length that match the file extension specified in the `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: A`searchPattern`與檔案的其中一個、 兩個或三個以上的字元的延伸模組會傳回具有該長度為完全符合指定的檔案副檔名的副檔名的檔案`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: When using the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 當使用問號萬用字元，此方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files in a directory, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns only the first file, while a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，給定目錄、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，搜尋的模式中的兩個檔案 」 檔案？。txt"傳回只有第一個檔案中搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the behavior of different lengths for the `searchPattern` parameter:
trans-unit.target: 下列清單顯示長度不同的行為`searchPattern`參數：

trans-unit.source: "*.abc" returns files having an extension of.abc,.abcd,.abcde,.abcdef, and so on.
trans-unit.target: "*.abc 」 會傳回檔案具有副檔名 of.abc,.abcd,.abcde,.abcdef，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: "*.abcd" returns only files having an extension of.abcd.
trans-unit.target: 「 *.abcd"會傳回具有副檔名 of.abcd 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: "*.abcde" returns only files having an extension of.abcde.
trans-unit.target: 「 *.abcde"會傳回具有副檔名 of.abcde 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: "*.abcdef" returns only files having an extension of.abcdef.
trans-unit.target: 「 *.abcdef"會傳回具有副檔名 of.abcdef 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Because this method checks against file names with both the 8.3 file name format and the long file name format, a search pattern similar to "*1\*.txt" may return unexpected file names.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查檔案名稱與 8.3 檔案名稱格式及長檔名格式，因為的搜尋模式類似於"* 1\*.txt 」 可能會傳回未預期的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, using a search pattern of "\*1\*.txt" will return "longfilename.txt" because the equivalent 8.3 file name format would be "longf~1.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用搜尋模式的 「\*1\*.txt"會傳回"longfilename.txt"，因為對等的 8.3 檔案名稱格式會是"longf~1.txt"。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元規範

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合

trans-unit.source: * (asterisk)
trans-unit.target: * (星號)

trans-unit.source: Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （問號）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 該位置中的零個或一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "*t" searches for all names in ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，字串"* t"搜尋以字母"t"結尾中的所有名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.source: Wild cards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "*t" searches for all directory names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"* t"中的所有目錄名稱的搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all directory names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有目錄名稱的搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。

trans-unit.source: The string ".." can only be used in `searchPattern` if it is specified as a part of a valid directory name, such as in the directory name "a..b".
trans-unit.target: 字串".."只可用在`searchPattern`如果它已指定為屬於有效目錄名稱，例如目錄名稱中 」。。b"。

trans-unit.source: It cannot be used to move up the directory hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 它不能在目錄階層中向上移動。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The directory name.
trans-unit.target: 目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.Name%2A> property returns only the name of the directory, such as "Bin".
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.Name%2A>屬性會傳回目錄，例如"Bin"的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To get the full path, such as "c:\public\Bin", use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.FullName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的完整路徑，例如"c:\public\Bin"，使用<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.FullName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> requires no permission (beyond the read permission to the directory necessary to construct the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.Exists%2A>) but can give out the directory name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>需要任何權限 (建構所需的目錄的讀取權限之外<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.Exists%2A>)，但可以提供目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to hand out a <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> to a protected directory with a cryptographically secure name, create a dummy directory for the untrusted code’s use.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要交給 out<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>密碼編譯安全的名稱與受保護的目錄，建立未受信任的程式碼使用的虛擬目錄。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the name of the current `DirectoryInfo` instance only.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的目前名稱`DirectoryInfo`只執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent directory of a specified subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定子目錄的父代 (Parent) 目錄。

trans-unit.source: The parent directory, or <see langword="null" /> if the path is null or if the file path denotes a root (such as "\\", "C:", or * "\\\server\share").
trans-unit.target: 父代目錄，或<see langword="null" />如果路徑是 null 或者檔案路徑代表根目錄 (例如"\\"，"C:"或 *"\\\server\share")。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates referring to the parent directory of a specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範參考指定的目錄的上層目錄。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: for reading from files and directories and for access to the path.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取檔案和目錄和路徑的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />, <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />， <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the root portion of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得目錄的根目錄部分。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the root of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 表示根目錄的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays root locations for specified directories.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示指定的目錄的根位置。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: for reading from files and directories and for access to the path.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取檔案和目錄和路徑的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />, <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />， <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />

trans-unit.source: An object that describes an ACL entry to apply to the directory described by the <c>path</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 物件，描述要套用至 <c>path</c> 參數所描述之目錄的 ACL 項目。

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> object to the directory described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 物件所描述的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目套用至目前 <see cref="T:System.IO.DirectoryInfo" /> 物件所描述的目錄。

trans-unit.source: An access control list (ACL) describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 存取控制清單 (ACL) 說明個人和/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method applies ACL entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法適用於代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的檔案 ACL 項目。

trans-unit.source: The ACL specified for `directorySecurity` replaces the existing ACL for the directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ACL`directorySecurity`取代現有目錄的 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL, and modify it.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來取得現有的 ACL，並加以修改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法仍然只存在<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件建立後已修改的物件。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>不修改物件，不會保存至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不可以擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同物件。

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another:
trans-unit.target: 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>從原始程式檔的物件。

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>目的地檔案的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>來源方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法可複製的資訊擷取到目的地的步驟 3 中<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件。

trans-unit.source: Set the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object to the destination file using the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定目的地<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>物件到目的地檔案時使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> methods to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a directory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>方法來新增，然後再移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目從一個目錄。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="directorySecurity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="directorySecurity" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 找不到或無法修改檔案。

trans-unit.target: 目前的處理序不具有開啟檔案的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows 2000 (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.target: 列舉的目錄的存取控制清單 (ACL) 權限。
